subject: GUI for JUnit tests from console
msgSnippet: I have an AllTest class. In that class I have the public static Test suite() methode where I add my tests. For users who hasn t installed an IDE I add a main
messageBody:
I have an AllTest class. In that class I have the "public static Test
suite()" methode where I add my tests.

For users who hasn't installed an IDE I add a main methode:
public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}
So they can start the tests on the console. That works great.
But only when I use the textui. It's not possible to use junit.awtui or
junit.swingui. It's because junit.awtui and junit.swingui needs a Class
and not a Test.
Is there a way to start the GUI in the main methode?
